nl.tudelft.dnainator.graph.impl

Class Neo4jSingleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tudelft.dnainator.graph.impl.Neo4jSingleton

  • public final class Neo4jSingleton
extends Object
    This singleton class instantiates and keeps track of all Neo4j databases.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteDatabase()
      Deletes the contents of the database associated with the default path, if it exists.
      void deleteDatabase(String path)
      Deletes the contents of the database associated with the specified path, if it exists.
      Neo4jGraph getDatabase()
      Retrieves the database associated with the default path, if it exists.
      Neo4jGraph getDatabase(String path)
      Retrieves the database associated with a specified path, if it exists.
      Set<String> getDatabasePaths()
      Returns the database paths of all databases instantiated through this singleton.
      static Neo4jSingleton getInstance()
      Returns the unique instance of the Neo4jSingleton.
      void stopDatabase(String path)
      Stops and deletes the the database associated with the specified path, if it exists.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Neo4jSingleton getInstance()
        Returns the unique instance of the Neo4jSingleton.
        Returns:
        the unique Neo4jSingleton

      • getDatabase

        public Neo4jGraph getDatabase()
        Retrieves the database associated with the default path, if it exists. Otherwise instantiates a new database.
        Returns:
        a database instance

      • getDatabase

        public Neo4jGraph getDatabase(String path)
        Retrieves the database associated with a specified path, if it exists. Otherwise instantiates a new database.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the database
        Returns:
        a database instance

      • getDatabasePaths

        public Set<String> getDatabasePaths()
        Returns the database paths of all databases instantiated through this singleton.
        Returns:
        a set of all database paths

      • deleteDatabase

        public void deleteDatabase()
        Deletes the contents of the database associated with the default path, if it exists. FIXME: Neo4jGraph seems to be unable to restart on a previously shut down path.

      • deleteDatabase

        public void deleteDatabase(String path)
        Deletes the contents of the database associated with the specified path, if it exists.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the database

      • stopDatabase

        public void stopDatabase(String path)
                  throws IOException
        Stops and deletes the the database associated with the specified path, if it exists. FIXME: Neo4jGraph seems to be unable to restart on a previously shut down path. DO NOT USE THIS METHOD!
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the database
        Throws:
        IOException - when the database could not be deleted
